sections.installation:
AUTOMATIC INSTALLATION (EASIEST WAY)

To do an automatic install the plugin, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and
click Add New. In the search field type “Survey Popup”. Once you have found it you can install it by simply
clicking “Install Now” and then “Activate”.

MANUAL INSTALLATION

  • Download the plugin
  • Navigate to the â€˜Add Newâ€™ in the plugins dashboard
  • Navigate to the â€˜Uploadâ€™ area
  • Select the plugin from your computer
  • Click â€˜Install Nowâ€™
  • Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
sections.faq:
Does the plugin too long to load?

This is a light-weight plugin and loads much faster. It does not affect website performance.
